Run the BHM for oceans.

Source: R/stats_bhm_ocean.R
run_bhm_ocean.Rd

Spatial ranges (range in degrees lon/lat) and process

Usage

run_bhm_ocean(
  mesh_filepath,
  grace_data_filepath,
  altimetry_filepath,
  argo_data_fileapth,
  output_folder,
  GRACE_dc = "JPL",
  prior_range_steric = 25,
  prior_sigma_steric = 30,
  prior_range_manometric = 65,
  prior_sigma_manometric = 10
)

Arguments

mesh_filepath

Ocean mesh filepath

grace_data_filepath

GRACE data filepath

altimetry_filepath

Altimetry data filepath

argo_data_fileapth

Argo data filepath

output_folder

Output folder

GRACE_dc

GRACE data centre, JPL or GSFC

prior_range_steric

Prior for range - ocean steric

prior_sigma_steric

Prior for sigma - ocean steric

prior_range_manometric

Prior for range - ocean manometric

prior_sigma_manometric

Prior for sigma - ocean manometric

Value

list: List of output filepaths for: ocean mass, ocean steric process and model output
